DOCNAME: CASE OF HASAN YAGIZ v. TURKEY
CONCLUSION: Violation of Art. 6-1;Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award
TEXT: CARDINAL . On DATE police officers from ORG arrested the applicant on suspicion of membership of an illegal armed organisation , the Dev - Yol ( NORP Way ) .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ( sıkıyönetim mahkemesi ) ordered the applicant ’s detention on remand .

CARDINAL . On an unspecified date in DATE ORG filed a bill of indictment with ORG against the applicant . ORG accused the applicant , inter alia , of membership of the Dev - Yol , whose object was to undermine the constitutional order and replace it with a NORP - Leninist regime . The prosecution sought the death penalty under LAW of LAW . It was further decided that this indictment should be joined to the indictment of CARDINAL DATE lodged against CARDINAL other ORG - PERSON defendants .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ordered the applicant ’s release pending trial .
CARDINAL . In a judgment of DATE ORG convicted the applicant on account of his involvement in the LAW . It sentenced the applicant to CARDINAL years’ imprisonment under LAW of LAW .
CARDINAL . The applicant appealed to ORG ( askeri yargıtay ) .

CARDINAL . Following promulgation of the PERSON of DATE , which abolished the jurisdiction of ORG , ORG ( yargıtay ) acquired jurisdiction over the case and on DATE the case file was transmitted to it .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG upheld the above judgment .
CARDINAL . Article CARDINAL § § CARDINAL and CARDINAL of LAW provides :

“ Whosoever shall attempt to alter or amend in whole or in part LAW or to effect a coup ORG formed under LAW or to prevent it by force from carrying out its functions shall be liable to the death penalty .

Accomplices to the crime specified in paragraph one , other than those specified in paragraph CARDINAL , shall be punished by heavy imprisonment for not less that DATE and be disqualified to hold public office for life . ”
